# Issue.Kind.expectationFailed(_:)

**Case**

An issue due to a failed expectation, such as those produced by [doc://org.swift.testing/documentation/Testing/expect(_:_:sourceLocation:)].

## Declaration

```swift
indirect case expectationFailed(Expectation)
```

## Parameters

- **expectation**: The expectation that failed.
title: Issue.Kind.expectationFailed(_:)
